citations.narrative:
During the inspection it was found that all dogs were up to date on their rabies. However, on record review, it could not be
shown that dogs that had three year rabies vaccines had had a complete physical exam since their last rabies vaccine.
This was over 12 months previous for many of the dogs in the kennel. Failure to have each dog examined at least once
every 12 months can result in delay of diagnosis and treatment for disease, illness, or injury.
All dogs must have a complete physical exam done by the attending veterinarian not less than once every 12 months.
Correction date: February 06, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
During the inspection it was found that all dogs were up to date on their rabies. However, on record review, it could not be 
shown that dogs that had three year rabies vaccines had had a complete physical exam since their last rabies vaccine. 
This was over 12 months previous for many of the dogs in the kennel. Failure to have each dog examined at least once 
every 12 months can result in delay of diagnosis and treatment for disease, illness, or injury. 
All dogs must have a complete physical exam done by the attending veterinarian not less than once every 12 months.  
Correction date: February 06, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
